Name: 像素修真 - Pixel Xiuzhen
About the game: In v1.10, all the bugs found earlier have been fixed.Community players select different characters to complete the game.Please rest assured. V1.10 also adds heroic dungeons, new martial arts and spells to increase late game challenge and playability. Email: elec2015@126.com Roguelike Or RPG？ Every time a Du jie fails, it is reincarnation, a 'resurrection' of Roguelike. A unique Roguelike. Single-player Or Online Games? 6 cyclic, unlimited tasks 5 instance zones are divided into 3 difficulty levels and 15 challenges 18 plot combats from Journey to the west 20+ herbal materials More than 100 basic equipments More than 20 kinds of BUFF with 5 kinds of quality have developed countless equipments A rich single-player game that extends your gaming experience Protagonist Or NPC? They also do tasks, instance zones, build equipment... You'll even be invited to explore the instance zones Autonomous NPCS Round Or Strategy? Different skill combinations to get a different BUFF: bleed, break armor, heal, fight... 80+ spells & skills 100+ skill mix Cannot count skill learning configurations A rich system of independent games, perhaps the longer you play, the more wonderful it will be.
